ui.app.httpsDescription: Bez HTTPS jūsu konfidenciālie dati tiks pārsūtīti nešifrēti.
ui.account.intro:
Welcome to the Contao Manager, a universal tool to install and manage Contao 4 Open Source CMS. If you are new to it, please read the manual to get started.

Be aware that this is a beta release. Due to different server setups, you might encounter problems with you hosting provider. Please report any issues on GitHub.
ui.account.headline: Lietotāja konts
ui.account.description: To manage your installation, please create an account for the Contao Manager. Be aware that this account is not related to the Contao back end or front end.
ui.account.contribute:
Contao and the Contao Manager are sponsored by the non-profit Contao Association.
Please consider contributing to open source by becoming a member.
ui.login.headline: Pierakstīties
ui.oauth.error: Invalid OAuth attempt. Check the request parameters.
ui.oauth.headline: OAuth Authentication
ui.oauth.description: The following application or service is requesting remote access to your Contao Manager instance.
ui.boot.headline: Sistēmas pārbaude
ui.boot.description: Lūdzu, uzgaidiet, mēs analizējam jūsu serveri ...
ui.boot.issue2: Your installation has issues that must be fixed before Contao Manager can be used.
ui.system.error: Check failed due to unexpected response from the server.
ui.system.prerequisite: Check cancelled due to missing prerequisite.
ui.system.selfUpdate.title: Contao pārvaldnieka atjauninājumi
ui.system.selfUpdate.update: Ir pieejama jauna Contao pārvaldnieka versija {latest}.
ui.system.selfUpdate.dev: Development builds do not support automatic updates.
ui.system.config.title: Servera konfigurācija
ui.system.config.description:
To correctly run background tasks, Contao Manager needs to know where to find the PHP command line binary and how to run commands separated from the web process.

Most server will be detected automatically. If your hosting provider is not listed, feel free tosubmit details using our issue tracker.
ui.system.config.formText: Select the configuration that matches your server or hosting provider. For a custom configuration, select "Other …".
ui.system.config.customText: Please enter the path to your PHP binary. Make sure the binary is the same PHP version as your web process.
ui.system.config.phpDetected: Your server is unknown but a valid PHP path was automatically detected.
ui.system.config.stateError: Your hosting provider is not configured.
ui.system.config.stateErrorCli: No valid PHP binary was found on the server.
ui.system.php_web.title: PHP Web Process
ui.system.php_web.below7: Atrasta PHP versija {versija}. Lūdzu, pēc iespējas ātrāk pārejiet uz PHP 7!
ui.system.php_web.success: Atrasta PHP versija {versija}, neviena zināma problēma nav atrasta.
ui.system.php_cli.title: PHP Command Line Interface
ui.system.php_cli.success: Atrasta PHP versija {versija}, neviena zināma problēma nav atrasta.
ui.system.composer.title: Composer Environment
ui.system.contao.title: Contao instalācija
ui.system.contao.headline: Contao uzstādīšana
ui.system.contao.description: Welcome to the setup process of your Contao Open Source CMS. You can choose between two versions to install.
ui.system.contao.ltsText: The LTS version has an extended support period of up to four years.
ui.system.contao.latestText: A new latest version is release every six months in June and December.
ui.system.contao.releaseplan: See the Contao Release Plan for detailed information.
ui.taskpopup.failedHeadline: Contao Manager neizdevās sākt konsole uzdevumu!
ui.taskpopup.failedDescription:
Something went wrong while trying to execute the task in the background.
If this happens again, your server might not be supported.
ui.taskpopup.installDescription: Lai pabeigtu iestatīšanas procesu, lūdzu, atveriet instalēšanas rīku un ievadiet datubāzes akreditācijas datus.
ui.taskpopup.packagesDescription: Lūdzu, atveriet instalēšanas rīku, lai piemērotu nepieciešamās datu bāzes izmaiņas.
ui.taskpopup.errorDescription: The background task was cancelled or stopped unexpectedly. Please check the console protocol.
ui.taskpopup.successDescription: Fona uzdevums tika veiksmīgi pabeigts. Vairāk informācijai apskatiet konsoles protokolu.
ui.taskpopup.confirmCancel: Are you sure to cancel this task? This might leave your installation in an unknown state, which might prevent the Contao Manager from working correctly!
ui.maintenance.rebuildCache.title: Application Cache
ui.maintenance.rebuildCache.description: Rebuilding the application cache is required after modifying any of the configuration files.
ui.maintenance.dumpAutoload.title: Composer Class Loader
ui.maintenance.dumpAutoload.description: The Composer autoloader is responsible for PHP class loading. The autoloader must be dumped it after adding custom namespaces to the root composer.json.
ui.maintenance.composerInstall.title: Composer Dependencies
ui.maintenance.composerInstall.descripti: Composer dependencies are located in the /vendor folder in your application root. Reinstalling the dependencies can be necessary after manipulation or manually uploading the composer.lock file.
ui.maintenance.debugMode.title: Debug Mode
ui.maintenance.debugMode.description: Activate the debug mode by setting a user and password for the app_dev.php entry point.
ui.maintenance.debugMode.user: Please enter a username for the debug mode.
ui.maintenance.debugMode.password: Please enter a password for the debug mode.
ui.maintenance.opcodeCache.title: Opcode Cache
ui.maintenance.opcodeCache.description: Opcode caches PHP files on the web process for faster execution. It must be deleted under certain circumstances if files are not recognized after changing.
ui.packages.updateConfirm: Visas pakotnes tiks atjauninātas uz jaunāko versiju. Vai vēlaties turpināt?
ui.package.hintConstraint: This package will be installed with constraint {constraint} when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintConstraintBest: This package will be installed in the best available version when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintConstraintChange: The constraint for this package will be changed from "{from}" to "{to}" when you apply the changes.
ui.package.hintRemoved: Šī pakotne tiks noņemta, kad piemērosiet izmaiņas.
ui.package.incompatibleText: This package is not supported in Contao 4 Managed Edition.
ui.package.abandonedText: Šī pakotne ir atzīmēta kā pamesta.
ui.package.replacement: This package is marked as abandoned, please use "{replacement}" instead.
ui.packagesearch.offlineExplain: Check your internet connection and disable JavaScript blockers in your browser.
